alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:31PM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR EASTERN JASPER AND NORTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 230 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Paulding, or 16 miles west of Quitman, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Orange and Rose Hill around 240 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
